00024 CreateVLNVDialog::CreateVLNVDialog(QWidget* parent, const VLNV* const vlnv):
00025 QDialog(parent), type_(VLNV::INVALID),
00026 vendorEdit_(0), libraryEdit_(0), nameEdit_(0), versionEdit_(0), layout_(0) {
00027 
00028         // the layout manager to control the layout of the dialog
00029         layout_ = new QGridLayout(this);
00030         layout_->setColumnStretch(1, 1);
00031 
00032         // the top text
00033         QLabel* topLabel = new QLabel(tr("Set the new vlnv information"), this);
00034         layout_->addWidget(topLabel, 0, 0, 1, 2, Qt::AlignTop | Qt::AlignLeft);
00035 
00036         // set the type if the vlnv pointer is valid
00037         if (vlnv) {
00038                 type_ = vlnv->getType();
00039         }
00040 
00041         setTypeBox(vlnv);
00042 
00043         setVendor(vlnv);
00044 
00045         setLibrary(vlnv);
00046 
00047         setName(vlnv);
00048 
00049         setVersion(vlnv);
00050 
00051 
00052         // The ok and cancel buttons and their layout
00053         QPushButton* okButton = new QPushButton(tr("Ok"), this);
00054         okButton->setDefault(true);
00055         connect(okButton, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00056                         this, SLOT(accept()));
00057         layout_->addWidget(okButton, 6, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignTop | Qt::AlignLeft);
00058 
00059         QPushButton* cancelButton = new QPushButton(tr("Cancel"), this);
00060         connect(cancelButton, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00061                         this, SLOT(reject()));
00062         layout_->addWidget(cancelButton, 6, 1, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft | Qt::AlignTop);
00063 
00064         return;
00065 }

00070 void CreateVLNVDialog::accept() {
00071         done(QDialog::Accepted);
00072 }
00073 
00074 void CreateVLNVDialog::reject() {
00075         done(QDialog::Rejected);
00076 }

00078 void CreateVLNVDialog::onAbstractorSelected() {
00079         type_ = VLNV::ABSTRACTOR;
00080 }

00083         type_ = VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION;

00095         type_ = VLNV::DESIGN;

00099         type_ = VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION;

00103         type_ = VLNV::GENERATORCHAIN;

00106 VLNV* CreateVLNVDialog::exec() {
00107 
00108         // call the base class implementation of the exec() function
00109 
00110         // if user clicked ok
00111         if (QDialog::exec() == QDialog::Accepted) {
00112                 return createVLNV();
00113         }
00114         // user clicked cancel
00115         else {
00116                 return 0;
00117         }
00118 }
00119 
00120 VLNV* CreateVLNVDialog::createVLNV() {
00121 
00122         // get the info from the lineEdit widgets
00123         QString vendor(vendorEdit_->text());
00124         QString library(libraryEdit_->text());
00125         QString name(nameEdit_->text());
00126         QString version(versionEdit_->text());
00127 
00128         // if the type is not specified the creation of vlnv is not possible
00129         if (type_ == VLNV::INVALID) {
00130                 QString title(QCoreApplication::applicationName());
00131                 QString text(tr("The type of vlnv was not specified"));
00132                 QMessageBox::critical(this, title, text);
00133                 return 0;
00134         }
00135         // none of the vlnv text fields can't be empty
00136         if (vendor.isEmpty() ||
00137                         library.isEmpty() ||
00138                         name.isEmpty() ||
00139                         version.isEmpty()) {
00140 
00141                 QString title(QCoreApplication::applicationName());
00142                 QString text(tr("None of the text fields can be empty"));
00143                 QMessageBox::critical(this, title, text);
00144                 return 0;
00145         }
00146 
00147         // create a vlnv instance and return the pointer to it
00148         VLNV* vlnv = new VLNV(type_, vendor, library, name, version);
00149         return vlnv;
00150 }

00152 void CreateVLNVDialog::setTypeBox(const VLNV* const vlnv) {
00153 
00154         QGroupBox* typeBox = new QGroupBox(tr("Select type of the vlnv"), this);
00155         QVBoxLayout* boxLayout = new QVBoxLayout(typeBox);
00156 
00157         // create the radio buttons and connect their clicked() signals to
00158         // event handlers
00159 
00160         QRadioButton* abstractorButton = new QRadioButton(tr("Abstractor"),
00161                         typeBox);
00162         boxLayout->addWidget(abstractorButton, 0, Qt::AlignTop);
00163         connect(abstractorButton, SIGNAL(clicked()),
00164                         this, SLOT(onAbstractorSelected()));
00165 
00166         QRadioButton* abstractionDefButton = new QRadioButton(
00167                         tr("Abstraction definition"), typeBox);
00168         boxLayout->addWidget(abstractionDefButton, 0, Qt::AlignTop);
00169         connect(abstractionDefButton, SIGNAL(clicked()),
00170                         this, SLOT(onAbstractionDefSelected()));
00171 
00172         QRadioButton* busDefButton = new QRadioButton(tr("Bus definition"),
00173                         typeBox);
00174         boxLayout->addWidget(busDefButton, 0, Qt::AlignTop);
00175         connect(busDefButton, SIGNAL(clicked()),
00176                         this, SLOT(onBusDefSelected()));
00177 
00178         QRadioButton* componentButton = new QRadioButton(tr("Component"), typeBox);
00179         boxLayout->addWidget(componentButton, 0, Qt::AlignTop);
00180         connect(componentButton, SIGNAL(clicked()),
00181                         this, SLOT(onComponentSelected()));
00182 
00183         QRadioButton* designButton = new QRadioButton(tr("Design"), typeBox);
00184         boxLayout->addWidget(designButton, 0, Qt::AlignTop);
00185         connect(designButton, SIGNAL(clicked()),
00186                         this, SLOT(onDesignSelected()));
00187 
00188         QRadioButton* designConfButton = new QRadioButton(
00189                         tr("Design configuration"), typeBox);
00190         boxLayout->addWidget(designConfButton, 0, Qt::AlignTop);
00191         connect(designConfButton, SIGNAL(clicked()),
00192                         this, SLOT(onDesignConfSelected()));
00193 
00194         QRadioButton* generatorButton = new QRadioButton(tr("Generator chain"),
00195                         typeBox);
00196         boxLayout->addWidget(generatorButton, 0, Qt::AlignTop);
00197         connect(generatorButton, SIGNAL(clicked()),
00198                         this, SLOT(onGeneratorChainSelected()));
00199 
00200         layout_->addWidget(typeBox, 1, 0, 1, 2, Qt::AlignTop | Qt::AlignLeft);
00201 
00202         // if the given pointer was empty then type is not preselected
00203         if (!vlnv) {
00204                 return;
00205         }
00206 
00207         // use the type parameter to preselect a type if it has been defined
00208         switch (vlnv->getType()) {
00209         case VLNV::ABSTRACTOR: {
00210                 abstractorButton->setChecked(true);
00211                 return;
00212         }
00213         case VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION: {
00214                 abstractionDefButton->setChecked(true);
00215                 return;
00216         }
00217         case VLNV::BUSDEFINITION: {
00218                 busDefButton->setChecked(true);
00219                 return;
00220         }
00221         case VLNV::COMPONENT: {
00222                 componentButton->setChecked(true);
00223                 return;
00224         }
00225         case VLNV::DESIGN: {
00226                 designButton->setChecked(true);
00227                 return;
00228         }
00229         case VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION: {
00230                 designConfButton->setChecked(true);
00231                 return;
00232         }
00233         case VLNV::GENERATORCHAIN: {
00234                 generatorButton->setChecked(true);
00235                 return;
00236         }
00237         default: {
00238                 return;
00239         }
00240         }
00241 }

00243 void CreateVLNVDialog::setVendor(const VLNV* const vlnv) {
00244         QString vendor(tr("Vendor:"));
00245 
00246         // if the vlnv pointer is valid use the previous vendor
00247         if (vlnv) {
00248                 vendor = vlnv->getVendor();
00249         }
00250 
00251         // the vendor text label and line edit
00252         QLabel* vendorLabel = new QLabel(tr("Vendor:"), this);
00253         layout_->addWidget(vendorLabel, 2, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft | Qt::AlignTop);
00254 
00255         vendorEdit_ = new QLineEdit(vendor, this);
00256         vendorEdit_->setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Expanding,
00257                         QSizePolicy::Fixed));
00258         vendorLabel->setBuddy(vendorEdit_);
00259         layout_->addWidget(vendorEdit_, 2, 1, 1, 1, Qt::AlignTop | Qt::AlignLeft);
00260 }
00261 
00262 void CreateVLNVDialog::setLibrary(const VLNV* const vlnv) {
00263         QString library(tr("Library:"));
00264 
00265         // if the vlnv pointer is valid use the previous library
00266         if (vlnv) {
00267                 library = vlnv->getLibrary();
00268         }
00269 
00270         // the library text label and line edit
00271         QLabel* libraryLabel = new QLabel(tr("Library:"), this);
00272         layout_->addWidget(libraryLabel, 3, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft | Qt::AlignTop);
00273 
00274         libraryEdit_ = new QLineEdit(library, this);
00275         libraryEdit_->setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Expanding,
00276                                 QSizePolicy::Fixed));
00277         layout_->addWidget(libraryEdit_, 3, 1, 1, 1, Qt::AlignTop | Qt::AlignLeft);
00278         libraryLabel->setBuddy(libraryEdit_);
00279 }

00281 void CreateVLNVDialog::setName(const VLNV* const vlnv) {
00282         QString name(tr("Name:"));
00283 
00284         if (vlnv) {
00285                 name = vlnv->getName();
00286         }
00287 
00288         // the name text label and edit
00289         QLabel* nameLabel = new QLabel(tr("Name:"), this);
00290         layout_->addWidget(nameLabel, 4, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignTop | Qt::AlignLeft);
00291 
00292         nameEdit_ = new QLineEdit(name, this);
00293         nameEdit_->setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Expanding,
00294                                 QSizePolicy::Fixed));
00295         layout_->addWidget(nameEdit_, 4, 1, 1, 1, Qt::AlignTop | Qt::AlignLeft);
00296         nameLabel->setBuddy(nameEdit_);
00297 }

00299 void CreateVLNVDialog::setVersion(const VLNV* const vlnv) {
00300         QString version(tr("Version:"));
00301 
00302         if (vlnv) {
00303                 version = vlnv->getVersion();

00305 
00306         // the version text label and edit
00307         QLabel* versionLabel = new QLabel(tr("Version:"), this);
00308         layout_->addWidget(versionLabel, 5, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignTop | Qt::AlignLeft);
00309 
00310         versionEdit_ = new QLineEdit(version, this);
00311         versionEdit_->setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Expanding,
00312                                 QSizePolicy::Fixed));
00313         layout_->addWidget(versionEdit_, 5, 1, 1, 1, Qt::AlignTop | Qt::AlignLeft);
00314         versionLabel->setBuddy(versionEdit_);
00315 }
